articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Iran
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Iran
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Chairman Choe Thae Bok left here Saturday to pay an official visit to Iran and attend the 6th international conference in support of the Palestinian people to be held in this country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Leave
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Mukesh Sharma, secretary general of the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, and his party and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party left here Saturday after taking part in the ceremony of awarding the International Kim Jong Il Prize.
					 Departing earlier were Henry Masiko, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Alexandr Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Zavtra, who are directors of the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council.

articles.title: Foreign Figure Skaters Leave for Home
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Leave for Home
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Players of Russia, Belarus, Canada France and Italy left here for home on Saturday after taking part in the 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival
articles.content:
25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival was held in Pyongyang from February 15 to 17 to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The festival brought together DPRK figure skaters and those from Russia, Belarus, Canada, France and Italy who proved successful in domestic and international games.
					
					 All the players showed well their reverence for leader Kim Jong Il through performances.
					
					 Kim Kwang Ho, deputy secretary of the Skating Association of the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 The performers successfully carried out jumps, skating and other movements to show their high technical and special skills, which was applauded by spectators.
					
					 The annual festival is an international sports festival of great significance.

articles.title: Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the venue of the 21st Kimjongilia Festival on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They went round the venue full of famous flowers in full bloom in reverence for Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who performed immortal exploits.
					
					 At the end of the visit Jo Il Min said that it is the festival praising the great man in the real sense of word.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The flowers on display reflect the profound reverence of all people for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 Kimjongilia is beautifully blooming in Seoul and local areas of south Korea, representing the ardent desire of the people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as father of the nation and lodestar of national reunification for all ages.
					
					 The flower of the sun will be kept in full bloom all over the world.

articles.title: Celebration Art Performance of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Celebration Art Performance of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan gave an art performance at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 15 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Chairman Ho Jong Man, vice-chairpersons Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu, O Min Hak and Kang Chu Ryon of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chairman of the Chongryon Central Audit Committee Hong In Hum, and leading officials of Chongryon organizations and businesses, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto and other Chongryon officials and compatriots and teaching staff and students of Korean University.
					
					 In such numbers as immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" the performers well represented the deep reverence of Korean residents in Japan for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the performance, officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan sang in chorus the song "We Are Mallima Riders" with the display of tender-hearted image of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the background of the stage.
					
					 The performance ended with chorus "Chongryon, Go forward Following Marshal".

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo to celebrate the 75th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among those present were Chairman Ho Jong Man, vice-chairpersons Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu, O Min Hak and Kang Chu Ryon of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chairman of the Chongryon Central Audit Committee Hong In Hum, and leading officials of Chongryon organizations and businesses, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto and other Chongryon officials and compatriots and teaching staff and students of Korean University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report at the meeting paid highest tribute and best wishes of immortality to Kim Jong Il, eternal teacher of Chongryon and tender-hearted father of Koreans in Japan, in reflection of reverence of all the Chongryon officials and compatriots in Japan.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a prominent leader of Chongryon and the benevolent father of Koreans in Japan as he guaranteed their happiness and opened up the bright future of generations to come, the reporter said.
					
					 The reporter noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has bestowed upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan all loving care just as Kim Jong Il did although he is very busy leading the building of a socialist power and the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 He stressed the importance to give steady continuity to the history of warm feelings and bonds the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forged with Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 The reporter called for maintaining the principle of patriotism and loyalty under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus further displaying the might of Chongryon which has grown under the care of the great leaders.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Lecture of Chongryon Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Lecture of Chongryon Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) gave a lecture at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 13 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, and other senior officials of Chongryon and officials of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto region.
					
					 The participants in the lecture watched a Korean documentary film "General Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot" (Part 1).
					
					 Then, they heard a video lecture "The Great Life Shining with Love for Young People".
					
					 The lecture deals with the immortal feats of leader Kim Jong Il who set a shining example in solving the issue of youth by embodying President Kim Il Sung's idea of prioritizing the young people.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 15 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at its venue were photos showing the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the visitors were Chairman Ho Jong Man, vice-chairpersons Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu, O Min Hak and Kang Chu Ryon of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Chairman of the Chongryon Central Audit Committee Hong In Hum, and other senior Chongryon officials, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and businesses and chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto.

articles.title: Korean Magic with Long History
articles.content:
Korean Magic with Long History
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation with a long history spanning five thousand years has created many artistic riches.
					 The Korean magic took its shape in the periods of the Three Kingdoms (early 3rd century B.C.-middle 7th century A.D.) and was further developed in the period of Koryo (918-1392).
					
					 Typical were such numbers as breathing out fire and swallowing knife together with many functional juggleries.
					
					 According to old books including "Rijo Silok", chronicles of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), the magic showed more variety in the period. Unknotting, puzzle and other admirable pieces were created.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Military's Anti-DPRK War Hysteria
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Military's Anti-DPRK War Hysteria
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers are going to stage the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises on the largest scale in history with the U.S. forces in March.
					 This shows that the puppet warmongers have gone beyond the danger line in their hysteria for invading the DPRK with an aim at bringing down it through provocation of a nuclear war, not content with putting unprecedented pressure on it in all fields of politics, economy and culture in collusion with foreign aggressors, Minju Joson Saturday says in a commentary.
					
					 The situation goes to prove who are the anti-reunification, sycophantic and traitorous forces keen on bullying acts to dampen the nation's desire and wish for the improvement of the north-south relations and detente and peace on the Korean peninsula, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It goes without saying that hysteric racket for invading the north kicked up by the puppet forces, keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen, and the hostile policy of the U.S. zealously instigating them are an intolerable challenge to the desire and wish of the fellow countrymen for peace and reunification and a wanton violation of the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 It is truth taught by history that neither logic nor entreaty will help beat back the reckless robbers brandishing their lethal weapons.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered its war deterrence for self-defence and preemptive nuclear striking capabilities to counter the nuclear weapons of aggression and tyranny brandished by the enemies with the nuclear weapons of justice.
					
					 Should the enemies launch an adventurous military invasion, misjudging the will of the DPRK to deal merciless retaliatory blow, its army and people will reduce the hotbed of provocation into a sea of fire and ashes in a minute by the Juche war method beyond imagination.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Plots to Erase Traces of Their Crimes under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Plots to Erase Traces of Their Crimes under Fire
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that business mobile phones of high-ranking officials including ministers, chiefs of agencies and their aides were physically scrapped, sparking off great furor in south Korea. It was reported that the scrapping had begun since the end of last year with the Intelligence Service involved.
					 Commenting on the fact, leading newspapers of the DPRK Saturday charge that such campaign is a cunning artifice of traitor Park Geun Hye and her yes men to destroy evidence proving their crimes related to the extra-large political scandal.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Much upset by the strong resentment of south Korean people of different social standings at their plot, the puppet authorities are making desperate efforts to get out of their predicament under the absurd pretext of threat from the north, a trite method they employed whenever they faced a crisis.
					
					 As there is great uproar over the above-said campaign, the south Korean authorities are trumpeting about "hacking attack of the north" and "measure to prevent the repetition of damage." 
					
					 The fact that the Intelligence Service planned and orchestrated the campaign brings to light the true colors of the conservative group as tricksters crying out for "countering the hacking attack of the north."
					
					 The IS is a group of accomplices in the extra-large political scandal as it has played the role of a shock brigade in the operations to prevent Park Geun Hye from being impeached and Chongwadae is the center for hatching all sorts of plots to help Park prolong her remaining days.
					
					 The Park group should know that their conspiratorial plots remind one of a drowning man trying hard to catch at a straw.
					
					 Minju Joson warns that the desperate efforts, made by the Park group to keep their crimes buried into oblivion through the destruction of evidence, refusing to honestly admit the unprecedented power-backed scandal, will only spark off bitterer resentment among the south Korean people and precipitate their doomsday.

articles.title: All-out Action for Forcing Park Geun Hye Regime to Step down Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-out Action for Forcing Park Geun Hye Regime to Step down Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for People's All-out Action, comprised of more than 50 organizations in south Korea, held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 14 to declare an all-out people's action for forcing the Park Geun Hye regime to step down, according to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the press conference the headquarters announced a press release.
					
					 The press release enumerated the crimes committed by the Park regime such as the ferry Sewol disaster, MERS case, deployment of THAAD, agreement on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, shutdown of the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Park and the "state-compiled" history textbook.
					
					 It noted that the popular masses turned out in a campaign for forcing Park Geun Hye to step down to cope with the moves of her regime against democracy, livelihood and reunification and it resulted in the passage of motion on impeaching her at the end of last year.
					
					 However, Park Geun Hye remains in Chongwadae, denying the order of the people, and Hwang Kyo An and his yes-men are making desperate efforts to keep deep-rooted evils practiced by the Park regime, the press release charged.
					
					 It declared that the organization would sponsor a large-scale all-out people's action on Feb. 25 to show again what is the will and voice of the public and confirm the resignation and impeachment of Park.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup Escalates Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Buildup Escalates Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A U.S. missile tracking warship Howard Lorentzen, equipped with X-band and S-band radars, entered the Pusan Port of south Korae on February 12, according to its Yonhap News.
					 The U.S. seeks to deploy THAAD in south Korea under the pretext of someone's "provocation."
					
					 It is going to get its nuclear carrier Carl Vinson involved in the joint military drills to be staged in south Korea in March.
					
					 Nuclear-capable strategic bombers on Guam and in the U.S. mainland and stealth fighter jets in Japan are on standby to make sorties to south Korea.
					
					 Such reckless arms buildup is pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an unpredictable phase.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Myanmar and Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Myanmar and Italy
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Myanmar and Italian personages made public statements on Feb. 5 and 6 to mark the anniversary of birth of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, in his statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il devoted his all to prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and the cause of Korea's reunification during the whole period of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 His greatest exploit is that he smashed anti-socialist moves of the imperialist allied forces and firmly protected sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation.
					
					 He is the peerless patriot as he ardently loved the country and devoted himself to the country and its people.
					
					 Miriam Pelegrini Peri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy who is chairperson of the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, stressed that the great statesman Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of all people and his exploits for the Korean people and the world's progressives will be immortal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released the February issue of its bulletin to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In an article titled "Protector of Socialism" the bulletin said:
					
					 Protector of socialism is the great Comrade Kim Jong Il. He kept the unshakable faith in the victory of socialism.
					
					 His exploits for the global cause of socialism are too great that a few books are not just enough to carry them all.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership, the historic Pyongyang Declaration was adopted in April 1992.
					
					 The bulletin noted Kim Jong Il proved in a scientific way that the anti-socialist elements' slandering socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and domineering" is absurd sophism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by Regional Body
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The African regional preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il posted on its website on February 2 and 3 the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's works "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" and "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive".
					 "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution", a work published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a speech made at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014), clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution is a history of ideological work to give the fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks facing the field of the party ideological work and the ways for carrying them out.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Cedi Publishing House of DR Congo to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held by the Working Citizens' Association of DR Congo on Feb. 5.

articles.title: Magia coreana demuestra la inteligencia creativa de la nacion coreana
articles.content:
Magia coreana demuestra la inteligencia creativa de la nacion coreana
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- La nacion coreana, que tiene larga historia de 5 mil anos, vino creando muchos bienes artisticos y floreciendo su propia cultura. Entre estos bienes figura la magia que nacio en el periodo de tres Reinos (principios del siglo III a.n.e. - mediados del siglo VII) y se desarrollo notablemente en la epoca de Coryo.
					En aquel tiempo, las piezas mas atrayentes son vomitar el fuego, tragar el cuchillo y otras. Se presentaron muchas prestidigitaciones que muestran la mana rapida.
					
					Segun la "Cronica de la Dinastia de los Ri" y otros libros historicos, que registran muchos datos historicos de la epoca de la dinastia feudal de Joson, en aquel tiempo se diversificaron mas las magias, entre otras desenlazar la cuerda atada, adivinar las letras, etc.
					
					Hoy dia, la magia coreana demuestra el aspecto de su desarrollo y la perspectiva en el contenido, forma, descripcion y habilidad.

articles.title: Terminado 25o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
articles.content:
Terminado 25o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Concluyo la 25a edicion del Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo por el Premio Paektusan, dedicado al Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					En el evento, transcurrido del 15 al 17, tomaron parte los jugadores coreanos y los otros provenientes de Rusia, Belarus, Canada, Francia e Italia quienes sobresalieron en varias competencias nacionales e internacionales. 
					
					En sus movimientos sobre el hielo, ellos tradujeron su gran respeto al Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Kim Kwang Ho, subsecretario general de la Asociacion de Patinadores de la RPDC, dijo que el festival se ha preparado en el maximo nivel tanto en la programacion de piezas como en la composicion musical, y continuo:
					
					Los patinadores ejecutaron perfectamente los movimientos muy dificiles como el giro en suspension. 
					
					Los espectadores premiaron con fuerte ovacion los movimientos tecnicos y habiles de los jugadores.
					
					El festival, que tiene lugar anualmente en ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz, es una cita de dimension internacional que testimonia la gran veneracion del pueblo coreano y los otros del mundo hacia el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Minju Joson reitera el rechazo a Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Minju Joson reitera el rechazo a Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana planean ejecutar en la mayor dimension de la historia los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle con Estados Unidos, previstos para marzo que viene.
					Al respecto, el periodico Minju Joson publico este sabado un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Esto comprueba que sobrepasa el limite de peligro la fiebre agresiva de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos para "derrumbar" a toda costa a la RPDC mediante la guerra nuclear, al cabo de su inaudita campana para aplastarla que lanzaron en complicidad de las fuerzas extranjeras en todos los dominios como la politica, la economia, la cultura, etc.
					
					La realidad delata a todo el mundo quienes son los vendepatrias opositores a la reunificacion que sofocan la aspiracion nacional a la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur, la relajacion de tension y la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esta claro que la histerica campana de guerra anti-RPDC de la banda surcoreana, enloquecida por el servilismo al imperio gringo y la confrontacion fratricida, y la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. que la incita, significan imperdonable desafio a la aspiracion y demanda de los coreanos sobre la paz y la reunificacion y abierto atentado contra la dignidad y soberania del pais socialista.
					
					No se puede expulsar nunca con ninguna logica o solicitud a los bandidos que arremeten esgrimiendo armas.  Esto es la verdad que ensena la historia.
					
					La RPDC vino consolidando el disuasivo de guerra de autodefensa y la capacidad de ataque preventivo nuclear para contrarrestar con armas nucleares justicieras los mismos armamentos de agresion y opresion de los enemigos.
					
					Si ellos intentan la aventurera invasion armada menospreciando la voluntad de represalia del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC, estos reduciran a cenizas en un instante los focos de provocacion con su inimaginable y autoctono modo de guerra.
